paper_abstract: This study utilizes the artificial neural network to explore the nonlinear relationships between patent performance and the corporate performance of the pharmaceutical companies. Patent performance measured from patent H index, patent citations, and essential technological strength (ETS). The result shows that patent H index, patent citations, and ETS has the nonlinear effect on the corporate performance of the pharmaceutical companies. (C) 2012 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Exploring the nonlinear effects of patent H index, patent citations, and essential technological strength on corporate performance by using artificial neural network
